data.name: Gates of Siberia
data.detailed_description:
Welcome to the Tyumen region - Gates of Siberia. It was from this region that the development of Siberia began. Visit our region without leaving your home!

You are expected:
  • virtual tours and attractions;
  • interactive visits to sanatoriums and hot springs;
  • a real time machine in which you can visit the historical events of the Tyumen region;
  • the opportunity to experience all current and future tours of the Tyumen region environment;
  • interactive help about objects.

All tours are served in the format of mini-games of various genres: you will solve puzzles, drive cars, shoot cannons, participate in river and land battles, as well as do archeology and many other things. All adventures are available in both virtual reality mode and VR emulation mode.

data.short_description: Virtual travels and adventures in the Tyumen region. Get to know our region without leaving your home!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i3 3.0 GHz / AMD Ryzen 3 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i7 3.0 GHz / AMD Ryzen 7 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11

mac_requirements.recommended:
